questions: What is the URL for a local Tracardi API instance?
What is the URL for connecting a local Tracardi GUI to a remote Tracardi API?
What is the tip for connecting a local Tracardi GUI to a remote Tracardi API?
answer:
## Tracardi API instance
![Log-in form](../images/log-in.png)

Type tracardi API instance URL. For local installation it is `http://localhost:8686`. 

!!! Tip

    You can connect your local Tracardi GUI to remote Tracardi API.
